Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.scene

Class BoardSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ViewObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.scene.BoardSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenericSceneController
public class BoardSceneController
extends ViewObservable
implements GenericSceneController
This class implements the controller of the scene of the board. Most of the game will be played here.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • BoardSceneController

      public BoardSceneController()
      Default constructor.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()

    • setSpaceClickType

      public void setSpaceClickType​(MessageType spaceClickType)
      Sets the click type which will be handled after the click itself. This is needed in order to differentiate the various click on the same grid and perform the right operation.
      Parameters:
      spaceClickType - the click type for the next phase.

    • setAvailablePositionClicks

      public void setAvailablePositionClicks​(int availablePositionClicks)
      Sets the clickable positions on the board grid.
      Parameters:
      availablePositionClicks - the new positions which can be clicked.

    • updateSpaces

      public void updateSpaces​(ReducedSpace[][] reducedSpaces)
      Updates the spaces on the board with the latest info received from the server.
      Parameters:
      reducedSpaces - every spaces of the board.

    • setEnabledSpaces

      public void setEnabledSpaces​(java.util.List<Position> positionList)
      Enables the spaces on the board. All the others spaces will be disabled.
      Parameters:
      positionList - the list of spaces to enable.

    • setDisabledSpaces

      public void setDisabledSpaces​(java.util.List<Position> positionList)
      Disables the spaces on the board. The others spaces will not be affected.
      Parameters:
      positionList - the list of spaces to disable.

    • enableEffectControls

      public void enableEffectControls​(boolean enable)
      Enables or disables the effect controls.
      Parameters:
      enable - set to true to enable the controls, false to disable.

    • updateMatchInfo

      public void updateMatchInfo​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> players, java.util.List<ReducedGod> gods, java.util.List<Color> colors, java.lang.String activePlayer)
      Updates the displayed infos about the current match. Infos are about the list of players, the turn of the player.
      Parameters:
      players - a list of player's nicknames.
      gods - a list of player's gods.
      colors - a list of player's color.
      activePlayer - the nickname of the playing player.
